column4: When I type sudo ./jre-6u<version>-linux-i586.bin, it says "sudo: ./jre-6u13-linux-i586.bin: command not found". This is my very first days of using linux.
make sure you type it properly.. Sun and sun are different things in linux.. since it's case sensitive
you can also just type the first few letter then hit TAB and it will autocomplete for you
